scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-win && npm run bundle-linux && npm run bundle-mac
scripts.dist: npm run dist-win && npm run dist-linux && npm run dist-mac
scripts.dist-win: npm run bundle-win && cd out && bestzip MysqlDumper-win32-ia32.zip MysqlDumper-win32-ia32/* && bestzip MysqlDumper-win32-x64.zip MysqlDumper-win32-x64/*
scripts.dist-linux: npm run bundle-linux && cd out && bestzip MysqlDumper-linux-ia32.zip MysqlDumper-linux-ia32/* && bestzip MysqlDumper-linux-x64.zip MysqlDumper-linux-x64/*
scripts.dist-mac: npm run bundle-mac && cd out && bestzip MysqlDumper-darwin-x64.zip MysqlDumper-darwin-x64/*
